alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 09 at 6:22PM EDT until September 09 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SUSQUEHANNA AND NORTHWESTERN LACKAWANNA COUNTIES... At 621 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Benton, or near Waverly, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clifford, Dalton, Factoryville, La Plume, East Benton, Tompkinsville, Fleetville, Glenwood, Lenoxville, and Royal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
